Mario Carneiro said:

Isn't this kind of verbose though? It would be great if this could be written foo as fn(_) -> _ as usize but I don't think that syntax works

This is an interesting point. We have Foo { .. } in patterns to match multiple fields; could it makes sense to allow fn(..) -> _ as a way to match any function pointer type? And similarly, Fn(..) -> _ for Fn<_, Output = _>?
